languages.text: {n}Душераздирающий хохот заполняет темное помещение: Маражай, окончательно потерявший голову, смеется, сотрясаясь всем телом.{/n} "Да! Вот так! Этот дразнящий аромат крови, волнующее дуновение ужаса! Вот то, ради чего стоит жить, то, что придает смысл — всему!" {n}Мгновение — и он вдруг оказывается перед вами, склонившись к вам с высоты своего роста, с перекошенным от счастливого оскала насытившегося маньяка лицом.{/n}

{n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! That's it! That mouth-watering scent of blood, that thrilling wave of terror! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}

Этот дразнящий аромат крови, волнующее дуновение ужаса! Вот то, ради чего стоит жить, то, что придает смысл — всему!" {n}Мгновение — и он вдруг оказывается перед вами, склонившись к вам с высоты своего роста, с перекошенным от счастливого оскала насытившегося маньяка лицом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黑暗的甲板上充斥着令人毛骨悚然的吼叫声。玛拉斋已经彻底失去了理智，他此刻正在放声大笑，浑身上下剧烈地抽搐着。{/n}“没错！就是这样！这令人垂涎欲滴的鲜血之味！这惊心动魄的恐怖之潮！这就是生命的意义，这就是一切的意义！”{n}片刻之后，他突然出现在你面前。他俯下了高耸的身躯，面容扭曲，仿佛心满意足的疯子一样开心地狞笑着。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! That's it! That mouth-watering scent of blood, that thrilling wave of terror! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗的甲板上充斥着令人毛骨悚然的吼叫声。玛拉斋已经彻底失去了理智，他此刻正在放声大笑，浑身上下剧烈地抽搐着。{/n}“没错！就是这样！这令人垂涎欲滴的鲜血之味！这惊心动魄的恐怖之潮！这就是生命的意义，这就是一切的意义！”{n}片刻之后，他突然出现在你面前。他俯下了高耸的身躯，面容扭曲，仿佛心满意足的疯子一样开心地狞笑着。{/n}

languages.text: {n}身の毛もよだつ叫び声が、暗いその場所に響く。マラズハイはすっかり元気になって、発作を起こしそうなほど全身で笑っている。{/n}「そう！これだ！このよだれが出そうな血の匂い、あのゾクゾクする恐怖の波！これがあるから生きるってのは面白い！このおかげで全てが意味を持つ！」{n}次の瞬間、マラズハイはあなたの目の前に移動してくると、長身をかがめて顔を寄せてくる。彼は満腹の狂人のように幸せな熱い眼差しに顔を歪ませていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! That's it! That mouth-watering scent of blood, that thrilling wave of terror! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身の毛もよだつ叫び声が、暗いその場所に響く。マラズハイはすっかり元気になって、発作を起こしそうなほど全身で笑っている。{/n}「そう！これだ！このよだれが出そうな血の匂い、あのゾクゾクする恐怖の波！これがあるから生きるってのは面白い！このおかげで全てが意味を持つ！」{n}次の瞬間、マラズハイはあなたの目の前に移動してくると、長身をかがめて顔を寄せてくる。彼は満腹の狂人のように幸せな熱い眼差しに顔を歪ませていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un rugido helador llena el oscuro compartimento: Marazhai ha perdido completamente la cabeza y se ríe entre las convulsiones que sacuden su cuerpo.{/n} «¡Sí! ¡Eso es! El sabroso aroma de la sangre, ¡la emoción de las oleadas de terror! Esto es lo que hace que la vida tenga sentido, ¡lo que da sentido a todo!». {n}Momentos después, lo tienes delante, agachándose con la mirada lasciva y feliz de un loco saciado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! That's it! That mouth-watering scent of blood, that thrilling wave of terror! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rugido helador llena el oscuro compartimento: Marazhai ha perdido completamente la cabeza y se ríe entre las convulsiones que sacuden su cuerpo.{/n} «¡Sí! ¡Eso es! El sabroso aroma de la sangre, ¡la emoción de las oleadas de terror! Esto es lo que hace que la vida tenga sentido, ¡lo que da sentido a todo!». {n}Momentos después, lo tienes delante, agachándose con la mirada lasciva y feliz de un loco saciado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un rugissement à glacer le sang emplit le compartiment plongé dans la pénombre. Marazhai, qui a totalement sombré dans la folie, rit à gorge déployée et son corps tout entier est pris de convulsions.{/n} « Oui ! C'est ça ! Cette irrésistible odeur de sang, cette vague de terreur enivrante ! Voilà ce qui fait que la vie vaut la peine d'être vécue, ce qui donne tout son sens à notre existence ! » {n}Un instant plus tard, vous vous retrouvez nez à nez alors qu'il se penche vers vous de tout son haut, les traits déformés par le masque lubrique du sadique qui vient d'assouvir ses appétits sanguinaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! That's it! That mouth-watering scent of blood, that thrilling wave of terror! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rugissement à glacer le sang emplit le compartiment plongé dans la pénombre. Marazhai, qui a totalement sombré dans la folie, rit à gorge déployée et son corps tout entier est pris de convulsions.{/n} « Oui ! C'est ça ! Cette irrésistible odeur de sang, cette vague de terreur enivrante ! Voilà ce qui fait que la vie vaut la peine d'être vécue, ce qui donne tout son sens à notre existence ! » {n}Un instant plus tard, vous vous retrouvez nez à nez alors qu'il se penche vers vous de tout son haut, les traits déformés par le masque lubrique du sadique qui vient d'assouvir ses appétits sanguinaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das finstere Abteil wird von einem grauenerregendes Brüllen erfüllt: Marazhai, der mittlerweile vollständig seinen Kopf verloren hat, lacht und wird dabei von zahlreichen Krämpfen erschüttert.{/n} "Ja! Das ist es! Der unwiderstehliche Geruch von Blut, die höchst erregende Welle des Schreckens! Genau das macht das Leben lebenswert, das verleiht allem einen Sinn!" {n}Kurz darauf steht er plötzlich vor dir, beugt sich von hoch aufragender Höhe herab und verzieht sein Gesicht zur grinsenden Fratze eines Wahnsinnigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! languages.text: {n}Kan dondurucu bir kükreme, karanlık kompartımanı dolduruyor. Artık aklı tamamen başından giden Marazhai, kahkaha atıyor. Tüm bedeni kasılmalarla çalkalanıyor.{/n} "Evet! İşte bu! Kanın o ağızları sulandıran kokusu, dehşetin o heyecan dolu dalgası!.. İşte hayatı yaşanılır kılan bu, her şeye anlam yükleyen bu!" {n}Bir süre sonra aniden önünde beliriyor. Upuzun boyuyla yere çömeliyor. Yüzüne karnı doymuş bir akıl hastasına yaraşan, mutlu bir sırıtış hâkim oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blood-curdling roar fills the dark compartment: Marazhai, who has now well and truly lost his head, is laughing, his whole body racked with convulsions.{/n} "Yes! This is what makes life worth living, this is what gives meaning to everything!" {n}A moment later, he is suddenly in front of you, bending down from his towering height, his face twisted in the happy leer of a sated maniac.{/n}
